description:
Smarter hotel booking just got smarter.

Agoda.com for iOS - a world of hotels in the palm of your hand.

The Agoda.com advantage. To go.
- Over 500,000 hotels worldwide
- 8 million + hotel reviews every year
- Best price guaranteed! New deals every day!
- Trusted by over 16,000,000 customers

Look what you can do:
- Book over 500,000 hotels worldwide
- Click to find hotels near you, wherever you are
- Use our filters to find the perfect hotel for your budget and style
- Find your way back to the hotel with interactive maps

Plus you can save confirmations for hassle-free check-in, pay with total security, and flip through millions of customer reviews and enjoy the full Agoda.com experience wherever you are, all with the customary ease of your iOS device.

Agoda has been reviewed in the press!
New York Times - "a good place to begin your search… including specially negotiated last-minute rates that can offer savings"
The Sunday Times - "We found that for top-end, luxury accommodation, they were on average 10% cheaper."
trackCensoredName: agoda - hotel booking in 56,000 cities worldwide
trackName: agoda - hotel booking in 56,000 cities worldwide
releaseNotes:
Thanks for all the feedback, here’s the latest update:
- Faster and easier booking form
- We’ve fixed a bug on the hotel screen so that you can now favorite a hotel after you filter search results by name
- We’ve fixed a bug on the text search screen so you can have a smooth scrolling experience
- Optimized layout for iPhone 6 and iPhone 6+
